response.original_title: 名探偵コナン から紅の恋歌
response.overview: Bombing case at Nichiuri TV in autumn. The Satsuki Cup, which crowns the winner of Japan's Hyakunin Isshu, is currently being filmed inside the facility. The incident results in a big commotion and, while the building is burning to ashes, the only people left inside are Hattori and Toyama Kazuha. They get rescued just in time by Conan , who rushes to the scene. Both the identity and purposes of the bomber are unknown.
response.tagline: In the game of death... Conan's holding all the cards!
response.title: Case Closed: The Crimson Love Letter
